blogPosts.title: DevFest Ireland 2025: Bigger and Better Than Ever
blogPosts.excerpt: We're excited to announce DevFest Ireland 2025, taking place in the heart of Ireland with amazing speakers, workshops, and networking opportunities.

author.name: Sarah O'Brien
author.bio: Sarah is the lead organizer for DevFest Ireland and has been involved with Google Developer Groups for over 5 years.

blogPosts.title: Call for Speakers Now Open - Share Your Expertise
blogPosts.excerpt: Are you passionate about technology and want to share your knowledge? Our call for speakers is now open for DevFest Ireland 2025.

author.name: Michael Kelly
author.bio: Michael leads the program committee for DevFest Ireland and is passionate about fostering knowledge sharing in the developer community.

blogPosts.title: What's New in Google Technologies for 2025
blogPosts.excerpt: Explore the latest updates and innovations in Google's developer ecosystem that will be featured at DevFest Ireland 2025.

author.name: Emma Thompson
author.bio: Emma is a Google Developer Expert in Web Technologies and has been building web applications for over 8 years.

blogPosts.title: Community Spotlight: GDG Dublin's Amazing Year
blogPosts.excerpt: Take a look at the incredible work and events organized by Google Developer Group Dublin throughout 2024.

author.name: David Wilson
author.bio: David leads GDG Dublin and has been organizing developer events for over 6 years.

blogPosts.title: How to Make the Most of Your DevFest Experience
blogPosts.excerpt: Tips and tricks for attendees to maximize their learning and networking opportunities at DevFest Ireland 2025.

author.name: Lisa Murphy
author.bio: Lisa manages community engagement for DevFest Ireland and loves connecting developers.
